question:
[Janice]'s son, [Oscar], had to stay home from school with a cold. [Dannielle] and her sister [Fay] were arguing over a toy. While they were fighting, [Dannielle]'s sister [Beverly] grabbed the toy, and ran off to play with it by herself. [Oscar] and his son [William] went to look at cars. [Oscar] ended up buying the Mustang. [Ethel], who is the sister of [Janice], is a lovely girl. [Dannielle] went shoe shopping with her sister [Fay]. [Dannielle] went to her father [William] Birthday party [Joseph] was playing tennis with his sister [Ethel]. Afterwards, he was planning on playing chess with his sister [Michele].
Question: How is [Michele] related to [Beverly]?
